channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Aloha Heart
channel.desc: Sara travels to Hawaii for her best friend's wedding, but instead of enjoying a relaxing holiday, she finds herself helping the new manager make changes to his family hotel.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hidden Gems
channel.desc: When Addie loses her grandmother's ring in the waters of Hawaii, she hires a sailor to help her to find it, rediscovering her love of the sea along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Modeled With Love
channel.desc: When Olivia's dad is set to retire from their model-making firm, she thinks she will simply take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend her plans.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Marry Me Pact
channel.desc: When a psychic tells Charlotte she is destined to marry her best friend, Rory, only one thing stands in her way. his fianc?e.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet On You
channel.desc: Small-town pie shop owner Kate meets city boy Drew, who plans to tear down her business to build a neighbourhood of new homes. Can her love - and her pies - win him over.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Groundswell
channel.desc: On the heels of a personal and professional setback, Chef Emma travels to Hawaii where she meets a handsome surf instructor whose lessons help her regain her footing.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Eat, Love, London
channel.desc: All Stella wants is to take over her family-run restaurant in the US and marry her boyfriend. But when everything falls apart, she travels to London to begin a new path.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love Hacks
channel.desc: Relationship coach Sam believes she can fix any romance and she's creating a podcast to prove it. But then producer Josh poses some unexpected hurdles.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Wedding Of A Lifetime
channel.desc: A recently separated couple must put their differences aside when they find themselves competing in a nationally televised contest to win an all-expenses-paid wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Married By Mistake
channel.desc: After losing her job, exec Riley gets drunk in Las Vegas and wakes up married. Things get even more complex when she meets her new husband's brother.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Two Tickets To Paradise
channel.desc: After being left at the alter by their respective partners, a bride and a groom encourage each other to still go on their honeymoons, not knowing they're heading to the same resort.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love And Penguins
channel.desc: While trying to keep a failing Australian penguin sanctuary open, a nonprofit worker loses her heart to a compassionate zoologist.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: To Her, With Love
channel.desc: Two teachers are brought together as they fight to save their school's art department.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Planning On Forever
channel.desc: Busy events planner Emma doesn't have time for love, but could the charming best man at her sister's wedding convince her to give romance - and him - a second chance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love & Jane
channel.desc: Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, is surprised when her wish to talk to her favourite author comes true and Jane Austen herself appears in her life.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Betty's Bad Luck In Love
channel.desc: Since childhood, Betty has been cursed with romance, with all of her relationships ending in disaster. But after meeting Alex, she tries once more. Can true love break the curse.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Real West
channel.desc: Sparks fly between recently widowed Rebecca and ranch hand Jake, who works at the property she goes to on holiday. But is Jake's availability a worrying factor in their relationship.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Lease On Love
channel.desc: Poppy and Milo are getting engaged, but only so that she can advance her career and he can move into a penthouse. It's purely transactional. Or is it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love Under The Lemon Tree
channel.desc: While staying at the Lemon Tree Farm, budding photographer Beck must save things from growing sour and help the handsome owner save his land. Zesty romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love On Retreat
channel.desc: When hard-working content creator Jenny goes on a retreat in search of the 'life' element of a 'work/life balance', she ends up finding love as well.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hidden Gems
channel.desc: When Addie loses her grandmother's ring in the waters of Hawaii, she hires a sailor to help her to find it, rediscovering her love of the sea along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love's Fast Lane
channel.desc: After a video of her goes viral, a mechanic finds herself falling for a charming publicist as they aim to turn her into the first female host of the world's biggest car show.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Perfect Harmony
channel.desc: Best Man Jack and Maid of Honour Professor Barrett may not sing from the same hymn sheet, but working together on their friends' wedding might just result in a duet of a lifetime.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mountain Rescue Romance
channel.desc: The iciest of hearts melt when a preppy avalanche expert and a no-nonsense rescue ranger are stationed at the same mountain park.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Wedding Contest
channel.desc: When a couple can't decide on a theme for their upcoming wedding, they end up hiring two wedding planners, Taylor and Ben, to compete for the job.

channel.title: A Pinch Of Portugal
